title: Create R Irrigation local service website with SEO city pages

requirements.text: Create a header component with R Irrigation logo on the left, navigation menu with links to Home, Services, Service Areas, Reviews, and Contact pages, prominent phone number (973) 955-8340 displayed clearly, and a 'Get Free Estimate' button
acceptanceCriteria: Header displays logo on the left side
Navigation includes all five menu items: Home, Services, Service Areas, Reviews, Contact
Phone number (973) 955-8340 is prominently displayed in the header
'Get Free Estimate' button is visible in the header

Trust line: Licensed & Insured • Fast Response • 5-Star Rated

requirements.text: Create 'Why Choose R Irrigation' section with four icon bullets highlighting fast service, experienced technicians, reliable work, and serving Northern NJ

requirements.text: Create services grid section displaying six services: Sprinkler Repair, Sprinkler Installation, Spring Startup, Winterization, Leak Detection, and System Upgrades

requirements.text: Create service area section mentioning Clifton NJ prominently plus nearby towns in Bergen and Passaic County

requirements.text: Create customer reviews section displaying 2-3 realistic testimonial examples with customer names and service descriptions
